game.name: Pigeon Hunter
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Pigeon Hunter is classic hidden object game. Find the pigeons and other items in a series of beautiful hand drawn environments. Complete each scene and traverse though a dream like home.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Pigeon Hunter is classic hidden object game. Find the pigeons and other items in a series of beautiful hand drawn environments. Complete each scene and traverse though a dream like home.
